name: Tomb of the Space Emperor: Extremely Early Prototype
name_original: Tomb of the Space Emperor: Extremely Early Prototype
description: My Bridge Project for Trevor, Class of 2021! The Space Emperor is dying, and to commemorate his death, he is building a giant tomb in space out of the space shapes of alien races. You are a simple space cargo hauler, whose ship is pulled into the giant mass known as the Space Emperor's tomb. Like the others, the Emperor tries to put you under his control and make you his slave to help build his tomb, but he fails. It's up to you to destroy the Lich Emperor and free your ship and all the others caught up in his evil monument.
